author: Minecraft
description:
This episode of Minecraft Monthly might not be as full of spine-chilling noises and frightening shadows as the rest of October, but Vu is planning to enter the Dangerous Mob Department, so he might not be seen again!

Once Vu respawns, he’ll tell you all about the following:
00:00 – 00:36 – The classic, wild intro
00:37 – 00:50 – The exact amount of copper found in our latest game drop – The Copper Age
00:51 – 01:26 – A Minecraft Live recap with a classic blooper reel and highlights
01:27 – 02:24 – The latest about our upcoming game drop – Mounts of Mayhem
02:47 – 03:05 – How much punch the upcoming Dragon Ball Z DLC is packing
03:06 – 03:34 – A brand-new multiplayer adventure – Soul Steel
03:35 – 03:46 – A bit of exciting Hollywood news
03:47 – 05:00 – Two new mobs that are on the loose

Check out latest game drop – The Copper Age: https://www.minecraft.net/article/play-the-copper-age-today

And learn more about our upcoming game drop Mounts of Mayhem: https://www.minecraft.net/artic
title: TWO NEW MOBS INCOMING! | MINECRAFT MONTHLY
